# nutri.cam

[![CI status](https://github.com/krmax44/veganscan/workflows/build/badge.svg)](https://github.com/krmax44/veganscan/actions/new)
[![Go to nutri.cam](https://img.shields.io/badge/url-nutri.cam-blue?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://nutri.cam)
![Cool domain badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/cool%20domain-heck%20yea-success)

Barcode scanner to check whether a product is vegan/vegetarian - soon with more detailed information. Check it out at [nutri.cam](https://nutri.cam). Data is from [OpenFoodFacts](https://world.openfoodfacts.org/).
